wikipedia_page.main:
William Collins (15 November 1951 – 1 January 2014), better known by his stage name Billy McColl, was a Scottish actor.
Billy McColl died on 1 January 2014, aged 62, in London, England. He was survived by his daughter, Maud.

Still Life was first performed at the Traverse Theatre Club, Edinburgh, on 27 May 1982. Billy McColl played Phil, Gerard Kelly played Spanky, Elaine Collins played Lucille, Andy Gray played Jack Hogg, David Hayman was the director, and John Byrne was the designer.
William, Willie, Bill or Billy McColl or MacColl may refer to:
